product_name: Salomon XT Wings Running Shoes - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With lots of the same features as the adult version, the kids' Salomon XT Wings Running Shoes are built for smaller, lighter runners who like to explore trails and urban terrain. Breathable mesh uppers are flexible, abrasion resistant and offer long-lasting performance; synthetic leather overlays provide structure and support for uneven terrain. Synthetic toe caps protect little toes from bumps. Padded heels, collars and tongues increase comfort by alleviating pressure; heel loops aid entry. Tuck the quick-pull laces into the integrated lace pockets to keep them from snagging on anything. Nylon linings wick away moisture, dry quickly and breathe well. EVA midsoles absorb shock and offer ample cushioning all day. The kids' Salomon XT Wings Running Shoes boast nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles to deliver reliable traction. Closeout.
short_description: With lots of the same features as the adult version, the kids' Salomon XT Wings Running Shoes are built for smaller, lighter runners who like to explore trails and urban terrain.
